content:
Ninnaall sthuthiyodu raajamakall-haa-haa-
Ninvalamaayu raajabhaaminiyum.
/tninnazhakarachan mohippaan-haa-haa-
/tnin janamorkkaaykku pithrgrhavum.

Bhakthar pukazhchaa bhaajaname
Ninniludichorekasuthan
Thrkkarall nyangallilalivaan than
Pakkalapekshayanaykkenam.

Mannamakallkkaayu shlo-mmo
Vanneki-doothavaran
“ninnodu kooden naathhan ni-
Nnil than udayamathum".

Akhila jagathpathiye naayaka-
Naayetti ghoshicha-
Ngathi bahumaanichu mariyaam,
Valuthaam padavaayu thaan.

Daivatthin maathaa-mariyaaminnum nibiya-
Nmaarkkum shleehanmaar-kkum nal sahade-nmaarkkum
Sabhayin makkallkko-kkekkum kaalam thorum
Enneykkum nallo-rormmayathundaa-katte.

Thiruvullllatthaal ka-nyakayaam mariyaa-minnull
Jaathanathaaya jaathi-kkaare vazhi ne-raakki
Rakshichavall thanno-rmmaykkaunnathyam cherttha
Suthanaayu sthothram praar ththhikkattavall nyangallkkaay.

Sveekaranam nedi-daivatthin maathaavaay
Ikshithi shaapatthe neekkiya kanyakaye!
Shaanti kshemangall, sabhayilumengum vaanee-
Daanakaathmajano-dabhyarththhikkename.

Kromba sraappikall than savidham vittavatharanam
Cheythaa kanyaka than -udare vaanone!
Aadaamyare saatthaan-mrthiyiva thannadimayil ni-
Nnettiduvaan meyye-ntiya veeraa sthothram.

Moraaneesho! Kurishum nin
Maathyajanatthin praarththhanayum
Adikalleyum nin kopatthin
Vadikalleyum maaycheedenam.

Nirttheedaruthe parishuddhe!
Nyangallkkaayullllarththhanaye
Nyangallilaardratha thonneedaan
Ekaathmajanodarththhikka

Nayavaan pana pole thallirtthidume-haa
Vallarumavan lebanon kaarakil pol,
Vrddhathayilumavar thallirittuthazhachidume-haa
Varddhikkumavarkku thushdi pushdikallum,

Orupolingum (maartthommaa)
Unde melum ninnormma
Uthakaname nin praarththhana nin
Ormmaye bahumaanichorkkaay.

Praarththhanayin samayamithallo (maartthommaa)
Pathivinpadi ninkoottatthalayaay' praarththhikka
Impamezhum nin paattil shraddhicheedum nin
Aadukalle musheppol thrkkai vaazhtthanam.

Ninne varichoru thaarunnum (maartthommaa)
Ninnormmaye bahumaanicha suthanum sthothram
Ninne mudi choodeedunna roohaa vandyan,
Nin praarththhana krpayettatte nyangallkkennum.

Nirmmala nibimaare, raajyasuthashleehanmaare,
Paapaabdhiyilengall thaazhaayvaan praarththhichiduvin.

Sal sahadenmaaraam daivatthin daasanmaare
Ningade praarththhanakall kottakallengallkkaakatte.

Lokarkkupakaaram-choriyunna mahaanidhiyaakum
Vaanijaveeraa! Sveekrthane! Shlomo
Rogangalleyaatti dushdaathmaakkalle neekkaname
Nin praarththhanayaal-krpa nedattengall.

Sathyodyogasthhaa! Neethi thikachiha vaagdattham
Cheythoru nithya jeevithamaarjippaan,
Nirnnidram nompum-praarththhanayum peedayumetta
(maartthommaa) than-smrthiyil sthuthi mashihaa.

Paavananibimaare raajyasutha shleehanmaara
Abhyarththhippin-bhoovanakshemaarththham.
Samaram maayatte-kalaham shamamaarnneedatte.
Sabhayum sutharum-sthuthi paadeedatte.

Nirmmala nibi shleehaa sahaanmaare! Ningallude
Makudam vaanil bhakthajanam bhoovil;
Mashihaathan sabhayil -shakthi vallartthiya ningallude
Smrthi maanicho-nengum dhanyan thaan.

Parishuddhanmaare! Ningall
Praarththhippin kartthaavodaay
Adikalleyum than kopatthin
Vadikalleyum maayicheedaan.

(maartthommaa) sadgunanidhiye
Nin smrthi kondaadum sabhayil
Anavaratham nin naathhante
Shamavum shaantiyumamaratte.

Chaartthum neethiye nin aachaaryanmaarum
Mahimaye nin nayavaanmaarum-haa-haa--
Ninnabhishikthamukham thirippikkalle
Nin daasan daavee-din moolam.
/tnin puthranmaar kaatthidumengkil-haa-haa-
/ten niyamattheyum nyaanupadeshichidumee saakshiyeyum.

Shuchiyodushuddhyaa beskkudishaa
Sparshichullllappaadangall
Pookkudyaanadvaarangall
Vaanavarotthu vasikkenam.

Daivam srshdichaadatthe;
Srashdaavodu thulyam srshdi-
Yaay; manmayanudyaanatthil
Tharu nirayil poyu vanneedu
/tnnathu kaanmaanullllaanandam
/tsookshichum kondu mevi
Koorunnee'renmaar-manninuyarcha'yilaashcharyam.

Nin gaathram kaikkondum nin
Rakthatthaal punyappettum
Nidraapraapthanmaarorkka-
Ppedanam-svargeeyor shlemil
/tnee simhaasanamereettaa
/tdushdare veraakkunneram
Santushdanmaaraayavar nin valamaayu nilkkenam.

Nirmmala madbahaayil kartthr-
Snehaal shushrooshichoraam
Vaidikare pinchellum va-
Nneerenmaar devaagaare.

Bhamgyaa daivasuthaa! Ninne
Shushrooshichoru vaidikare
Ninnaagamana mahaanaallil
Ortthu mukhaprabhayekename.

Mochanamaachaaryarkkekuka-haaleluyyaa
Shreshdhamathaam thanurakthangalle mochanamezhuvaan
Paavanabalipeedhe kaikallilaa-ghoshichavaraay
Dayaraadevaalayamivayil-shushrooshichoda
Raachaaryanmaar shemmaashanmaare nnivarudeyaa
/tkadabhaaram-thirumeyyaal neekki
/tpokkaname-paapam rudhira'tthaal
Paadeedum 'naathhaa sthuthi' ennavar nin-valabhaaga.

Mudikall mudanyava niranirayaay
Balipeedhatthilirippund
Nirmmalaraayu parikarmmippo
Raachaaryarkkava choodeedum.

Aachaaryeshaa! Mashihaa! Koodaashakallarppicho
Raachaaryanmaarkkekuka punyam naathhaa sthothram.

Makkallilappan krpa cheyvathu pole - haaleluyyaa
Bhakthanmaaril Daivam krpa cheyyum.
/tpullinu thulyam naranude naallkallaho-haaleluyyaa
/tpookkunnithu vayalil poo-chedi pole.

Sharanatthaale nin krpayil
Maranamadanyoru daasare nin
Jeevasvaramathunartthaname,
Kabareennudyaanatthinnaay.

Rakshakane, nin gaathratthe bhakshichum nin
Vilayerum rakthakkaasaa paanam cheythum
Mrtharaayore naasham neekki jeevippi-
Chaniyenam ninne nokkunnavaril kaanti.

Mrthare jeevippippaanezhunnallllum raajaa, mukilazhakinmelaaghoshithanaayeedunnu,
Nayavaanmaar than munkompin naadam ketti-
Ttangkiyaninyethirelppaanaayu poyeedunnu.

Uyirekunnon raajaavuyaratthil ninnazhunnalllli,
Jeevan mrtharaam evarkkum nalkunnu.
Kabarukallullllil ninningavaravaruyirodezhunnettu
Uyirekum ni-nne sthuthi cheytheedunnu.

Ente shareeram bhakshichen raktham paanam cheyvon
Paathaallatthil - pokaanaayu vidaa, nyaan
Ennumavan jeevippaan angettheettu marichathu nyaan,
Ennum kartthaa-thannarullinnu mahatthvam.

Naathhaa! Thaavakamirulo-kam
Ninnadhikaaram thaane-ngum
Sleebaayaal jeevithare-kaa-
Tthanpaal mukthi mrtharkke-ka.

Sthothram! Mrthajeevapra-dane!
Kabareennetteedunno-ne!
Nin preshakathaathanuma-malan
Roohaaykkum haaleluyyaa.

Maramathinuyare, kartthaave!
Kallllanu kittiya ninte varam
Thrithvatthe kondaadi mari-
Chorum kaikkondeedenam.

Than maranatthaal-maranatthe
Jeevippichavanaam-daivasuthaa!
Sthuthi daivatthinne-nnaarkkaan
adiyaare poozheennettaname.

Vellum shathrukkalle ninnaal nyangall-haa-
Dveshikalle methicheedum nin-naamatthil
/tvairikallil ninnum kaatthengalle nee-haa-
/tshathrukkalle la-jippichu.

Moonnaammaniyilumenneratthum vandikkunnu-
/tjeevasleebaaye
Nettiyilathine rooshmaa cheyyunnathu thaan nyangall-
/tkkabhayam sangketham
Raavum pakalum-dushdaneyum sainya-ttheyum paayi-
/tchathu kaattheedunnu.

Vibhajichaazhiye sainyasamaksham vadiyaal mooshaa,
/tgatharaayi sraayel
Kartthaaveshu sleebaayaale sheeyollum thura-
/tnnaa mrthareyetti
Kabaril ninnum-parudeeserum jee-vithamaam vazhi kaa-
/tttiya mashihaa dhanyan.

Sleebaaye vandippaanaay-heleni raajnyi
Nyapapattanamaam romayil ninnerushalemaarnnu
/tyoodanmaare kootti chonnevam:
/t“kaanichiduvin-sleebaa vachoridam”
"nyangallkkundoru pramukhan, nee-avanodaaraanyaal
Mashihaathan sleebaayamarum-sthhaanam kaanikkum”
/thaaleluyyaa - ennavaruracheythu.

Ammaanuvel deveshan-tharuvil thoongi
Eelshaadaayu thanayan veeran-thala thaazhtthi marichu.
/taathmam maathram-tharuvil kaivittu;
/tnija saaraamsham meniyil nivasichu.
Verpettaan nissaaramathaam-maanushamaam jeevan
Vilapicheedattunnathane-krooshichor yoodar;
/thaaleluyyaa -kashdamavarkkennum.

Naathhan koottaayulllla-thinaal-dushdane naam-pedikkilla.
Than divyaayudha dhaari-kallaam-nammallkkunnathiyundaakum.

Sleebaaye thollil thaangi-seeyonilninnum poyon
Mrtharthannasthhikallinmeethe - choriyatte karunappanineer.

Moraaneesho nin kurishil - thedeedunnadiyaarabhayam
Saatthaaneennathu samrakshi - chettaname vaanavaraaja.

Sleebaa vaazhuka svargatthil
Sleebaa vaazhuka bhoomiyilum
Sleebaa pallllikall dayaraakall-
Kkellaamaakaname kotta.

Yerushalem gogultthaayil
Krooshithanaameesho sthothram
paara pillarnnu than dhvaniyaal
Mrthareri sthothram paadi.
